content: I don't have a subjective preference or opinion, but i can suggest that you should visit gwangju national museum, which is a great place to learn about the history and culture of gwangju, as well as the country as a whole. the museum features various exhibits on the prehistoric, ancient, and modern eras of korean history, and also has a beautiful garden outside. another recommended museum is the may 18th national cemetery museum, which memorializes the victims of the may 18th democratic uprising in 1980, an important event in korean history.
